title: Vintage CRT Analog
summary: A unique watchface simulating a vintage, barely working CRT display.
description: There's nothing like it. Try it. You'll love it.There's also a digital version of it here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.marcovhv.crt
descriptionHTML:
There's nothing like it. Try it. You'll love it.
There's also a digital version of it here:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.marcovhv.crt
comments: The non animated passive mode actually looks better. Can you put an option for that to be the normal face too?
Great Thanks for making this, looks awesome. Would be even better if hand width and color (for example brighter) can be changed
Great theme Looks like a classic VHS viewfinder playback at low contrast and saturation.
Great face I just wish it was a little brighter. It's crazy dim compared to other faces.
Love this Awesome watch face. Thanks for making this
recentChanges: Should no longer ask for permissions.
